name: AB Human Time
author: Andrea Bianchini

sections.description: This plugin appends a text block at the bottom of single articles showing the time elapsed since a post was published in a human readable format using the wordpress function human_time_diff whit styling css included. Supports i18n and works well with theme providing genericons support.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ab-human-time directory to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
How can I contribute to language translations?

email the author at endrix.develop@gmail.com.
